name: Company of Heroes 2: German Commander - Storm Doctrine
summary: German Commander - Storm Doctrine; Focused firepower and the ability to weather enemy counterattacks are hallmarks of this doctrine. Stuka Bombing Strikea JU-87D: Stuka will dive in and drop a 50kg bomb on the target location. Capture points are neutralized if hit. LEFH 18 Artillery: This light 10.
